articles.description: Aaron Rodgers said after Sunday's NFC Championship Game loss that he doesn't know what the future holds for him with the Packers.
articles.content:
GREEN BAY, Wis. -- Even Aaron Rodgers doesn't know what the future holds for him with the Green Bay Packers.
That's how he left things after Sunday's 31-26 loss to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in the NF… [+3983 chars]
